org.cpsolver.coursett.sectioning

Class RandomStudentSwap

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cpsolver.coursett.sectioning.StudentSwapGenerator
      • org.cpsolver.coursett.sectioning.RandomStudentSwap
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HillClimberSelection, NeighbourSelection<Lecture,Placement>

    public class RandomStudentSwap
extends StudentSwapGenerator
implements HillClimberSelection
    A neihbourhood selection that attempts to swap a student between alternative sections of a course. To be used with the Hill Climber (HC), Great Deluge (GD), or Simulated Annealing (SA) algorithms by adding this class in the AdditionalNeighbours property. Based on StudentSwapGenerator, but making a random selection of a lecture and of a student. The selection is only available/enabled when the solver is using a single thread (Solver.hasSingleSolution() is true) as student class assignments are not included in the solution.
    Version:
    CourseTT 1.4 (University Course Timetabling)
